segments.text: Good morning , Gav ! Did you sleep well last night ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I slept like a baby . I fell asleep right away last night , didn't wake up once , and didn't have any nightmares !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's great news ! You look much more relaxed than you did yesterday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I feel much better , but I'm still worried about something .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I have to drive to school for a meeting this morning , and I'm going to end up getting stuck in rush-hour traffic .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's annoying , but nothing to worry about .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: For me , traffic jams are quite stressful , because I'm pretty impatient . How can I prevent myself from getting stressed if I get stuck in a traffic jam ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just breathe deeply when you feel yourself getting upset .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is there anything else bothering you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just one more thing . A school called me this morning to see if I could teach a few classes this weekend and I don't know what to do .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have any other plans this weekend ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm supposed to work on a paper that'd due on Monday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Try not to take on more than you can handle .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You're right . I probably should just work on my paper . Thanks !
segments.speaker: S1
